data.message: I recently had some problems so it does not send more letters but I sent you if you are planning algm new project can sing, just do not know if I'll take credit for writing these songs, I have difficulties in dealing with the lack of money but not manage what I possess believe really come a partnership between me and you succeed great songs, I have humility to show my work I know that I'm the best because I'm still young so I see you as my teacher, I admire you for how I care about people who do not have much who fight for them, is engaged in helping people, and that's what makes you be who you are not what they say about you in the media, fan and fellow artist I thank by really be an inspiration to me my real idol
